    Function reference

    All functions

    clin_nowcast()
    Nowcast clinical laboratory percent positive flu data
    .mcga()
    Make clean column names
    fiphde_launcher()
    FIPHDE explorer app launcher
    forecast_categorical()
    Forecast categorical targets
    forecast_ili()
    Forecast ILI
    format_for_submission()
    Format forecasts for submission
    get_cdc_clin()
    Retrieve and prep clinical laboratory percent positive flu data
    get_cdc_hosp()
    Get hospitalization data from CDC FluView
    get_cdc_ili()
    Get ILI data from CDC FluView
    get_cdc_vax()
    Get vaccination data
    get_hdgov_hosp()
    Get hospitalization data
    get_nowcast_ili()
    Get ILI nowcast
    glm_fit()
    Fit glm models
    glm_forecast()
    Forecast glm models
    glm_quibble()
    Get quantiles from prediction intervals
    glm_wrap()
    Run glm modeling and forecasting
    hospitalizations()
    Laboratory-Confirmed Influenza Hospitalizations
    ilinet()
    Retrieve ILINet Surveillance Data
    is_monday()
    Check Monday
    make_tsibble()
    Make tsibble
    mmwr_week_to_date()
    Convert an MMWR year+week or year+week+day to a Date object
    mnz()
    Minimum non-zero
    mnz_replace()
    Minimum non-zero replacement
    plot_forecast()
    Plot forecasts
    pois_forc()
    Simple Poisson count forecaster
    prep_hdgov_hosp()
    Prep hospitalization data
    replace_ili_nowcast()
    Replace ILInet with nowcast data
    score_func_param_checker()
    Score function parameter checker
    smoothie()
    Calculate smoothed and weighted averages of previous observations
    state_replace_ili_nowcast_all()
    Replace all ILInet data with nowcast data for a state
    surveillance_areas()
    Retrieve a list of valid sub-regions for each surveillance area.
    this_monday()
    Get Monday
    to_num()
    Clean numeric values
    ts_fit_forecast()
    Fit and forecast with time-series approaches.
    ts_format_for_submission()
    Format time series forecast
    validate_forecast()
    Validate forecast submission
    weighted_interval_score()
    Compute weighted interval score
    who_nrevss()
    WHO/NREVSS surveillance data
    wis_score()
    Calculate WIS score

    Developed by VP Nagraj, Shakeel Jessa, Chris Hulme-Lowe, Stephen Turner.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
